description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级党和国家领导人。曾任中华人民共和国副主席、中共中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记、中共中央组织部部长及中共江苏省委书记。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a former Deputy-national level leader. He has served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China, a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, a secretary of the Central Secretariat, head of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee, and Party Secretary of Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国副主席、中共中央政治局常委、中央纪委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who has served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China, a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, and Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任全国人大常委会委员长、中央港澳工作协调小组组长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who has served as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress and head of the Central Coordination Group for Hong Kong and Macau Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician who has served as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央纪委书记、中共中央组织部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, and head of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，现任全国人大常委会委员长，曾任中共中央组织部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, who previously served as head of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李源潮的父亲，曾任上海市副市长。
description.en: Father of Li Yuanchao, former Vice Mayor of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 李源潮的母亲，苏北妇女运动先驱。
description.en: Mother of Li Yuanchao, a pioneer of the women's movement in northern Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 李源潮的妻子，中央音乐学院教授。
description.en: Wife of Li Yuanchao, a professor at the Central Conservatory of Music.

description.zh-cn: 李源潮的儿子，曾留学于耶鲁大学。
description.en: Son of Li Yuanchao, studied at Yale University.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家，曾任北京大学光华管理学院院长，李源潮的硕士导师。
description.en: A Chinese economist, former dean of the Guanghua School of Management at Peking University, and Li Yuanchao's master's thesis advisor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中共中央政法委员会书记，曾向胡耀邦举荐李源潮。
description.en: A Chinese politician, former Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, who recommended Li Yuanchao to Hu Yaobang.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中国国民党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, former Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，亲民党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, Chairman of the People First Party.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任新党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, former Chairman of the New Party.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国最高领导人。
description.en: The supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

nodes.id: 中央港澳工作协调小组

zh-cn: 中央港澳工作协调小组
en: Central Coordination Group for Hong Kong and Macau Affairs

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会负责领导香港和澳门工作的议事协调机构。
description.en: The deliberation and coordination body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for leading work related to Hong Kong and Macau.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leadership body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Politburo of the Communist Party of China and its Standing Committee.

en: Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管党组织建设和干部工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China in charge of party organization and cadre work.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国统一的红十字组织，是从事人道主义工作的社会救助团体。
description.en: The unified Red Cross organization of the People's Republic of China, a social relief group engaged in humanitarian work.

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省淮安市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Huai'an City, Jiangsu Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所公立综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A public comprehensive research university located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所公立综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A public comprehensive research university located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所公立综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A public comprehensive research university located in Beijing, China.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的、专门培训中国共产党高级领导干部的学校。
description.en: A school directly under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, specializing in training high-level CPC cadres.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国与大韩民国之间的战争。
description.en: A war between North Korea and South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 2007年太湖夏季暴发的大规模蓝藻污染事件，导致无锡市自来水出现严重水质问题。
description.en: A large-scale blue-green algae bloom in Lake Tai in the summer of 2007, which caused severe water quality problems in Wuxi's tap water.

en: The Strategic Choice for China’s Prosperity

description.zh-cn: 由厉以宁、孟晓苏、李克强、李源潮合著的经济学著作。
description.en: An economics book co-authored by Li Yining, Meng Xiaosu, Li Keqiang, and Li Yuanchao.

description.zh-cn: 李源潮是李干成的儿子。
description.en: Li Yuanchao is the son of Li Gancheng.

description.zh-cn: 李源潮是吕继英的儿子。
description.en: Li Yuanchao is the son of Lü Jiying.

description.zh-cn: 李源潮与高建进是夫妻关系。
description.en: Li Yuanchao and Gao Jianjin are husband and wife.

description.zh-cn: 李海进是李源潮的儿子。
description.en: Li Haijin is the son of Li Yuanchao.

description.zh-cn: 李源潮出生于江苏省涟水县。
description.en: Li Yuanchao was born in Lianshui County, Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 由于李源潮出生时朝鲜战争爆发，他的父母为其取名“援朝”，后改为“源潮”。
description.en: Because Li Yuanchao was born at the outbreak of the Korean War, his parents named him 'Yuanchao' (aid Korea), which was later changed to 'Yuanchao' (source tide).

description.zh-cn: 李源潮在北京大学师从经济学家厉以宁，并获得管理学硕士学位。
description.en: Li Yuanchao studied under economist Li Yining at Peking University and obtained a master's degree in management.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央政法委员会书记陈丕显向胡耀邦举荐李源潮，使其出任共青团上海市委副书记。
description.en: Chen Pixian, then Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, recommended Li Yuanchao to Hu Yaobang, leading to his appointment as Deputy Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Communist Youth League.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦接受陈丕显的举荐，任命李源潮为共青团上海市委副书记。
description.en: Hu Yaobang accepted Chen Pixian's recommendation and appointed Li Yuanchao as Deputy Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Communist Youth League.

position.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席
position.en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

position.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席
position.en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任中华人民共和国主席期间，李源潮任副主席。
description.en: During Xi Jinping's term as President of the People's Republic of China, Li Yuanchao served as Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 李源潮卸任中华人民共和国副主席，由王岐山接任。
description.en: Li Yuanchao stepped down as Vice President of the People's Republic of China and was succeeded by Wang Qishan.

relationships.target: 中央港澳工作协调小组

description.zh-cn: 在张德江担任中央港澳工作协调小组组长期间，李源潮任副组长。
description.en: While Zhang Dejiang was head of the Central Coordination Group for Hong Kong and Macau Affairs, Li Yuanchao served as deputy head.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局
中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 李源潮接替贺国强出任中共中央组织部部长。
description.en: Li Yuanchao succeeded He Guoqiang as Head of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李源潮卸任中共中央组织部部长，由赵乐际接任。
description.en: Li Yuanchao stepped down as Head of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee and was succeeded by Zhao Leji.

description.zh-cn: 在江苏任职期间，李源潮处理了2007年太湖蓝藻污染事件，表示“只要能把太湖治理好，哪怕GDP下降15%”，并推动了相关环保措施。
description.en: During his tenure in Jiangsu, Li Yuanchao handled the 2007 Lake Taihu algae bloom crisis, stating, 'As long as we can manage Lake Tai, even if GDP drops by 15%,' and promoted relevant environmental protection measures.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共江苏省委书记李源潮在南京会见时任中国国民党主席连战。
description.en: Li Yuanchao, then Party Secretary of Jiangsu, met with Lien Chan, then Chairman of the Kuomintang, in Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共江苏省委书记李源潮在南京会见时任亲民党主席宋楚瑜。
description.en: Li Yuanchao, then Party Secretary of Jiangsu, met with James Soong, then Chairman of the People First Party, in Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共江苏省委书记李源潮在南京会见时任新党主席郁慕明。
description.en: Li Yuanchao, then Party Secretary of Jiangsu, met with Yok Mu-ming, then Chairman of the New Party, in Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 李源潮访问朝鲜出席朝鲜战争停战60周年纪念活动，获得金正恩接见。
description.en: Li Yuanchao visited North Korea to attend the 60th anniversary of the Korean War armistice and was received by Kim Jong Un.

description.zh-cn: 李源潮与厉以宁、孟晓苏、李克强合著《走向繁荣的战略选择》。
description.en: Li Yuanchao co-authored 'The Strategic Choice for China’s Prosperity' with Li Yining, Meng Xiaosu, and Li Keqiang.

description.zh-cn: 厉以宁与李源潮、孟晓苏、李克强合著《走向繁荣的战略选择》。
description.en: Li Yining co-authored 'The Strategic Choice for China’s Prosperity' with Li Yuanchao, Meng Xiaosu, and Li Keqiang.

description.zh-cn: 李克强与厉以宁、孟晓苏、李源潮合著《走向繁荣的战略选择》。
description.en: Li Keqiang co-authored 'The Strategic Choice for China’s Prosperity' with Li Yining, Meng Xiaosu, and Li Yuanchao.
